reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Note: Stayed December 2009
reviews.title: Beautiful Haven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: This is by far the best hotel we've ever stayed at in Bali. The previous hotel we stayed at in Legian for this trip paled in comparison.
reviews.title: I wish I could say this hotel was excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: Staff made the difference

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Romantic
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel, great service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The amazing view
reviews.title: a zen like retreat!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: This was our second stay at this resort and it has only got better. The new Resort manager - Mr. Surya is undoubtedly raising the standard at the flagship Komaneka property. All the staff remembered my daughter and i from our last stay a year ago. Without doubt we were made to feel "at home". The food at the resort also seemed to be better than our last stay. The staff anticipated our needs and were always in the background if needed. Overall a wonderful vacation which we will repeat as soon as we can get the time to return.
reviews.title: Simply perfect....everything we wanted for a complete recharge of the body and spirit!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were upgraded from the Komaneka at Monkey Forest which was a pleasant surprise to start with, but when we arrived at the Bisma we just couldn't believe how beautiful the hotel was. The views over the valley and river were absolutely stunning and the hotel grounds need to be explored to be fully appreciated, there are secluded little paradises along the entire walkway which looks fabulous at night. The room itself was unreal, it was massive with living area including an Apple TV stored with 1000's of songs and 100's of movies. The bathroom is huge and modern, whilst somehow holding onto the beauty of Bali. The bathroom has a glass wall that overlooks the valley (or you can close privacy blinds) and the entire room has glass doors and windows so you never stop being in awe of your surroundings. The staff were just as exceptional here as at Komaneka at Monkey Forest as was the afternoon tea, water, gifts, fruit and nightly turn down service complete with night gown. The day spa has it's rooms overlooking the river running through the valley and whilst I didn't have time to use the facilities, the prices seemed very reasonable compared with other hotel in house services. As you wander through this magnificent property, you will discover the wedding chapel which is beautiful and modern and looks to be able to accommodate a decent sized wedding. It seems nothing has been overlooked at this hotel, you don't even need insect repellant as it's in the room. The included breakfast is unusual in that it's a table service rather than buffet, which is a refreshing change and we never left breakfast wanting more. We have stayed at two of the three Komaneka hotels in Ubud and are planning our next trip to stay at the third.
reviews.title: The most breath taking views, a perfect hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After traveling around in Bali we ended our vacation in Ubud. We booked a suite at Bisma, after arriving they upgraded us to a Villa. And what a villa! Total privacy and luxury combined. We felt like kings and we where treated like kings by the staff. The service was incredible. We had breakfast (á la carte), afternoon tea (complementary), and dinner overlooking the jungle and their gorgeous pool.
reviews.title: Luxury at its best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: If we had to comment on something it would be their cocktails which are quite expensive and far from high standard.
reviews.title: an amazing hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Their location are a little of, but we liked getting away from it all and since they provide free shuttles to ubud every hour it is not a problem.
reviews.title: The best hotel I've ever stayed in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We had a memorable and pleasant stay at Komaneka Bisma for 3 nights. K Bisma's staff has great customer service and are very thoughtful. The hotel has got breathtaking scenic views- waterfall! We can't believe we saw waterfall behind the hotel (inside the hotel compounds). Very glad that we took a tour of the hotel on our last day.
reviews.title: One of the highlights of my trip-Komaneka

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were upgraded to a one bedroom pool villa as the suite rooms were all taken up when we checked in. woohoo! We were happily shocked when we saw our pool villa - infinity pool in the villa, outdoor rain shower facility,bath tub, Apple TV ( not sure if it's the correct description), complimentary jugs of cookies and fruits, torch lights, umbrellas and mulitple chargers. We each have a welcome souvenir from the hotel. nice..
reviews.title: Amazing hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The first thing to highlight is the sincerity and thoughtfulness of the staff. They brought in a birthday cake and sang birthday song for my fren on her birthday! They said that they saw her birth date from her passport when we checked in. So sweet of them to get a cake for my fren..
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We requested morning call at 2 am the next morning (we reached Bali at 10pm) for our volcano trekking trip and called them to get a buggy to drive us to the lobby( as the villa seems far from the lobby when we walked in here on the first nite). And they really send a buggy to drive us to the lobby. THen we realised it was actually not that far! :P so embarrassed but thanks! Oh, and the Balieco cycling company was great too. THe guide helped me all the way down Mt Batur as I was too useless hah...
reviews.title: Amazing experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff recommended us places to go in Seminyak for our day trip and also places to massage. They were so friendly and full of smiles. I see no tireness in them. Thumbs UP!
reviews.title: Beautiful, wonderful hotel, excellent staff and amazing view. Only place to go if in Ubud.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Surya Nata, who is the manager of the Komaneka at Bisma, and his amazing team are redefining what relaxing and welcoming hospitality look like and I strongly encourage you to experience it by including this remarkable property in your Bali itinerary.
reviews.title: Evokes A Sense of Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Like many others, I was torn between going with the international luxury players and choosing an Indonesian premium player. While I'm a major fan of Four Seasons and St. Regis, the choice of home-grown team with an intimate 44 room property was the right one for me.
reviews.title: best vacation ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I stayed in a one-bedroom villa with a palatial bath, outdoor shower, immense private plunge pool, and outdoor dining area. Whatever you need is either in your villa or a quick call away. From straw hats to bug spray to cookie jars to sleep shirts, your needs are well cared for and from free internet to bottled water, one is always generously supplied with amenities.
reviews.title: Always impressive and memorable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Everyone quickly learns your name and smiles come standard at Komaneka! I utilized many services, including spa, shuttle, restaurant, and bicycle rental....they are so detail oriented that even the tires had been shined on the bike!
reviews.title: Wow..this is a gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The spa services are among the best I've ever had and are popular, so it would be wise to book in advance, especially for afternoons when guests are hiding from the strong sun. $75 for a two-hour massage and $40 for an hour facial were bargains given the quality of the therapists and the beauty of the spa facilities.
reviews.title: Don't look further...
